item.title: To Do
item.description: java coding, Elastic Search basics, PostgreSQL, Sql coding(basics), nginx setup and configure for two sites on same host https://www.liberiangeek.net/2015/07/how-to-run-multiple-websites-using-nginx-webserver-on-ubuntu-15-04/ sites are usually on location: /var/www/html/example-1.com /var/www/html/example-2.com
